mapper.select: select LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(attachedPhotoId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(attachedPhotoId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(attachedPhotoId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(attachedPhotoId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(attachedPhotoId), 12))) AS attachedPhotoId, attachedActivityType, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(attachedActivityId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(attachedActivityId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(attachedActivityId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(attachedActivityId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(attachedActivityId), 12))) AS attachedActivityId, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(uploadUserId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(uploadUserId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(uploadUserId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(uploadUserId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(uploadUserId), 12))) AS uploadUserId, uploadedDate, isDeleted, deletedDate from attachedphoto order by uploadedDate desc

select LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(attachedPhotoId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(attachedPhotoId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(attachedPhotoId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(attachedPhotoId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(attachedPhotoId), 12))) AS attachedPhotoId, attachedActivityType, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(attachedActivityId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(attachedActivityId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(attachedActivityId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(attachedActivityId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(attachedActivityId), 12))) AS attachedActivityId, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(uploadUserId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(uploadUserId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(uploadUserId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(uploadUserId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(uploadUserId), 12))) AS uploadUserId, uploadedDate from attachedphoto where attachedActivityId = UNHEX(REPLACE(#{activityid} , '-', '')) and isDeleted = 0 order by uploadedDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into attachedphoto( attachedPhotoId, attachedActivityType, attachedActivityId, uploadUserId ) values ( UNHEX(REPLACE(#{attachedPhotoId} , '-', '')), #{attachedActivityType}, UNHEX(REPLACE(#{attachedActivityId} , '-', '')), UNHEX(REPLACE(#{uploadUserId} , '-', '')) )
